named-query.name: BC_READ_STATIC_ASSET_FOLDER_CHILD_FOLDERS
named-query.query: SELECT staticAssetFolder FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.file.domain.StaticAssetFolder staticAssetFolder WHERE staticAssetFolder.parentFolder = :parentFolder AND staticAssetFolder.folderFlag = true AND staticAssetFolder.deletedFlag = false

named-query.name: BC_READ_NULL_STATIC_ASSET_FOLDER_CHILD_FOLDERS
named-query.query: SELECT staticAssetFolder FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.file.domain.StaticAssetFolder staticAssetFolder WHERE staticAssetFolder.parentFolder is null AND staticAssetFolder.folderFlag = true AND staticAssetFolder.deletedFlag = false

named-query.name: BC_READ_STATIC_ASSET_FOLDER_CHILD_PAGES
named-query.query: SELECT staticAsset FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.file.domain.StaticAsset staticAsset WHERE staticAsset.parentFolder = :parentFolder AND (staticAsset.sandbox = :userSandbox OR staticAsset.sandbox = :productionSandbox OR staticAsset.sandbox is null OR staticAsset.originalSandBox = :userSandbox) AND staticAsset.archivedFlag = false AND staticAsset.deletedFlag = false

named-query.name: BC_READ_NULL_STATIC_ASSET_FOLDER_CHILD_PAGES
named-query.query: SELECT staticAsset FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.file.domain.StaticAsset staticAsset WHERE staticAsset.parentFolder is null AND (staticAsset.sandbox = :userSandbox OR staticAsset.sandbox = :productionSandbox OR staticAsset.sandbox is null OR staticAsset.originalSandBox = :userSandbox) AND staticAsset.archivedFlag = false AND staticAsset.deletedFlag = false

named-query.name: BC_READ_STATIC_ASSET_BY_FULL_URL
named-query.query: SELECT staticAsset FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.file.domain.StaticAsset staticAsset WHERE staticAsset.sandbox = :targetSandbox AND staticAsset.fullUrl = :fullUrl
